lines.text: Here she was, the real thing - a gentlewoman - unbeatable!
Oh, forget it! Don't let's get soft just because the old fossil has a pretty daughter.
He was glad that the boys did not know how the same pretty daughter piqued and intrigued him.
Foreign born Hans Olsen was an expert at making the high priced shoes that ruin the feet of the women who wear them. The averaged $100.00 a week salary.
Juanita Claredon had long believed herself to have a first mortgage on the affections of Phil West.

[Raining outside]
The walk home was a good mile and a half long. Her throat hurt and there was little leather between her foot and the pavement.
In my young days gentlemen did not smoke while conversing with ladies and they removed their hats.

[singing with a miniature banjo]
He's not so good in a crowd, But when you get him alone, You'd be surprised, He isn't much at a dance, But then when he takes you home, You'd be surprised...
Now-a-days it is necessary for one's tailor to know whether one desires pint or quart pockets.
It is her one big chance and I haven't even decent tea to offer him.
And tea for two is so intimate!
It's damnable that your father isn't better paid.
That is surely my father's business.
For the first time she decided to go into debt. She would ask for credit!
We don't break our rule for no one. We have no charge accounts.
You say that it is a blot on the present day civilization that we expect to engage the finest mental equipment for a less wage than we pay the commonest labor.
Soldiers have been decorated for service no more distinguished than that required of our patient, loyal teachers.
We enjoy the distinction of having the finest educational system and school buildings in the world. Why are we so niggardly with our teachers?
